metadata.name: STC #01
metadata.description:
Does #sustainability mean green everywhere? Not possible. #Urban design focuses on less use of #natural resources. Another point is to create stable structures. Quality concrete, good design already sustains itself. I am not an architect or civil engineer. I'm just a city dweller worried about the city's future.

The artwork you see here explains precisely this.
On the technical side: Cinema4D + Vray
